fullDescription.intro:
This operation selects tuples (rows) of a relation (table) that satisfy some condition. The table is copied with the same or a reduced number of rows, possibly zero.
The condition is defined by an arbitrary expression, which must be of type Boolean. See the Jexl documentation for details.
All columns are available to use as variables in an expression, provided the column name is a Jexl simple identifier.
fullDescription.option: The expression to be evaluated, written in JEXL expression language.
